alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:39PM CST until January 31 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Perry, Greene and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, Beaumont...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until late Monday night. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CST Friday was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
